title: Closure
description: Exciting new romantic suspense from debut author, Angela Ford.An elite FBI task force tracks online predators while they hunt their prey. A series of murders in Presario Heights has forced Special Agent Jessica Resario to follow her gut instinct to save the next victim. Supervisory Special Agent Tom Erickson removes her from the case. The only place to escape the danger is her family beach home. She hadn’t been there since her parents were murdered.The level of intensity climbs higher with her discovery of postcards marked “I Crave You”.Old ghosts, secrets, imminent threats and an inevitable attraction to Tom send her on an emotional rollercoaster. If that wasn’t enough, she opens the door to a man she thought was dead.Tom is shot and his case files go missing…high emotions put Jess at the killer’s mercy.
author: Angela Ford
